creator: mhuffman@ca.ibm.com
text:
example.xsd
===========
<schema xmlns          ="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"
        targetNamespace="http://www.schemaTest.org/3_3sv"
        xmlns:sv       ="http://www.schemaTest.org/3_3sv">

<element name="Glass">
	<complexType>
		<sequence>
			<element ref="sv:HalfEmpty"/>
			<element ref="sv:HalfFull"/>
		</sequence>
	</complexType>
</element>

<element name="HalfFull" type="string" substitutionGroup="sv:HalfEmpty"/>

<element name="HalfEmpty" type="string" substitutionGroup="sv:HalfFull"/>

</schema>

example.xml
===========
<svi:Glass xmlns:xsi         ="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
           xmlns:svi         ="http://www.schemaTest.org/3_3sv"
           xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.schemaTest.org/3_3sv
                               example.xsd">

<svi:HalfFull>Yea</svi:HalfFull>
<svi:HalfEmpty>Aw</svi:HalfEmpty>

</svi:Glass>
